title: Debugging & Troubleshooting System
description: Complete debugging toolkit for identifying, analyzing, and resolving complex software issues. Combines AI-assisted debugging with powerful diagnostic commands.

useCases: Training junior developers on debugging techniques

items.reason: Provides expert debugging assistance and error analysis
Interactive debugging command with step-by-step guidance
Explains complex code behavior causing bugs

troubleshooting.issue: Collection items fail to load with 'missing component' errors
troubleshooting.solution: Verify all items exist in respective category folders (agents/, commands/). Install missing components individually first, then activate collection.

troubleshooting.issue: Prerequisites check passes but debugging features still unavailable
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure application logs are accessible and readable. Check development environment PATH includes debugger tools. Restart IDE after installing dependencies.

troubleshooting.issue: Debugging agent and debug command conflict causing duplicate output
troubleshooting.solution: Use agent for systematic analysis, command for quick fixes. Disable one component temporarily if conflicts persist. Check configuration.systemPrompt doesn't overlap.

troubleshooting.issue: Installation order not followed, components incompatible after setup
troubleshooting.solution: Remove all collection items and reinstall in specified order: debugging-assistant-agent, debug, explain. Clear Claude cache between installations.
